title.rendered: IRS Notice CP2000: Underreporting Income to the IRS

content.rendered:
Did you receive a surprise tax bill after underreporting income? CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang provide insight on what your tax bill could mean and steps you could take to resolve your tax burden with the IRS.

If You Need Tax Help, Contact Us Today for a Free Consultation
